mdragon::Font3D

Font3D Class Reference

3d font created from one texture. More...

Detailed Description

3d font created from one texture.

Member Function Documentation

void Create (  Render3D *  render,
const Char *  name
) 
 

Creates 3d font object from specified texture.

Need to call before any 3d font drawing operations. After this any new calls of Create() are not allowed.

Parameters:
render - pointer to Render3D class object.
name - pointer to ASCII name for specified font texture.

Vector3fx Draw (  const Char *  text,
Vector3fx *  v,
Vector3fx *  size,
Int  color,
Int  dir = 1
) 
 

Send 3d font text to draw queue.

Parameters:
text string Char buffer with 0-termenated byte in the end of string.
v pointer to Vector3fx point from where 3d text start in model coordinates.
size pointer to Vector3fx point that specify size of 3d font.
color define 3d text font color. See class Color.
dir define 3d text direction. 1 for horizontal drawing, 0 for vertical.
Returns:
Returns Vector3fx point that specify full size of drawing 3d text.

void Free (   ) 
 

Frees all memory used to store 3d font.

However this function don't delete 3d font object. You can call Create() function to create new 3d font.

Render3D* GetRender (   ) 
 

Returns pointer to Render3D object.

Returns:
Returns pointer to Render3D object.

Vector3fx GetSize (  const Char *  text,
Vector3fx *  v,
Vector3fx *  size,
Int  dir
) 
 

Returns Vector3fx point that specify full size of 3d text.

Parameters:
text string Char buffer with 0-termenated byte in the end of string.
v pointer to Vector3fx point from where 3d text start in model coordinates.
size pointer to Vector3fx point that specify size of 3d font.
dir define 3d text direction. 1 for horizontal drawing, 0 for vertical.
Returns:
Returns Vector3fx point that specify full size of drawing 3d text.
